00045 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*wxAppCommandEventFunction)(AppCommandEvent&);

00047 #define wxAppCommandEventHandler(func) \
00048     (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)wxStaticCastEvent(wxAppCommandEventFunction, &func)

00050 #define EVT_APP_COMMAND(winid, fn) DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE_ENTRY( wxEVT_APP_COMMAND_RECEIVED, winid, wxID_ANY, wxAppCommandEventHandler(fn), (wxObject *) NULL ),
